response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value proposition that we believe could significantly benefit your business or personal endeavors. Given its unparalleled features and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,250,000. We are confident that this investment will not only provide immediate value but also contribute to long-term success. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further.", "product_price": 1250000}
